name: ListyPosty.com
tag_list: online, classifieds, free, community, activities, for-sale, forums, housing, jobs, services, gigs, resumes, events, mls, major-league-soccer, mlb, major-league-baseball, nhl, national-hockey-league, nba, national-basketball-association, nfl, national-foot
overview:
ListyPosty is currently in beta stage of development, we are working on making ListyPosty a hybrid of a self posting classifieds site and search engine for classified listings combined. Why post on ListyPosty? We want to make the posting process safe and easy not only can you post one single ad to multiple cities, you can also have the option of having your items sold through 2checkout, Google checkout or Paypal.

ListyPosty has several websites including: the United States, the United Kingdom, and Canada.You will find local listings. If you are interested in the specific cities we cover, you can see metropolitan area lists for the United States, the United Kingdom and Canada.

ListyPosty simplifies the classifieds shopping experience. With ListyPosty, you can shop safer with simple buy now features from Google checkout and Paypal with out having to meet with the buyers in person and you do not have to worry about a million users flagging every post after only a few minutes of being posted.

For optimal viewing, we suggest Internet Explorer 6 or 7, Firefox 2 or higher, or the latest version of Safari.
